input.description: The name of the adapter to use to handle the request. Default adapter name: InfobloxNIOS.

item type : Defines the type of operation to be performed.
Supported 'item type'- 1. update-dns-record 2. update-fixed-address

The 'items' xml of the entity to be updated.
Below is an example 'items' xml to update DNS A record.
<items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <record-type>A</record-type> <query> <a-name>admin.demo.com</a-name> <ip-address>10.0.0.12</ip-address> <dns-view>default</dns-view> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2012-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <a-name>admin.demo.com</a-name> <ip-address>10.0.0.43</ip-address> <dns-view>default</dns-view> <comment>updated comment</comment> <disable>true</disable> <ttl>120</ttl> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>sample site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- sample for update-fixed-address
Sample items Xml:
1> For IPV4
<items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network>10.0.0.0</network> <mask>24</mask> <network-view>default</network-view> <network-type>ipv4</network-type> <ip-address>10.0.0.1</ip-address> <mac-address>00:00:00:11:11:11</mac-address> <dhcp-client-identifier>Value of dhcp-client-identifier</dhcp-client-identifier> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Building</key> <value>sample</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2015-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>true</disable> <name>Name Of Fixed Address</name> <ip-address>10.0.0.2</ip-address> <comment>Comment</comment> <dhcp-client-identifier>dhcp-client-identifier</dhcp-client-identifier> <lease-settings> <lease-time>121</lease-time> <routers>10.0.0.3</routers> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>10.0.0.5</dns-servers> <broadcast-address>127.0.0.1</broadcast-address> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Sample_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
The Query Criteria that can be follow are as below, to update fixed address. -> network,mask will get all the fixed address in the network. <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network>10.0.0.0</network> <mask>24</mask> <network-type>ipv4</network-type> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2015-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>true</disable> <name>Name Of Fixed Address</name> <ip-address>10.0.0.2</ip-address> <comment>Comment</comment> <dhcp-client-identifier>dhcp-client-identifier</dhcp-client-identifier> <lease-settings> <lease-time>121</lease-time> <routers>10.0.0.3</routers> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>10.0.0.5</dns-servers> <broadcast-address>127.0.0.1</broadcast-address> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Sample_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> network,mask and network-view. <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network>10.0.0.0</network> <mask>24</mask> <network-view>default</network-view> <network-type>ipv4</network-type> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2015-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>true</disable> <name>Name Of Fixed Address</name> <ip-address>10.0.0.2</ip-address> <comment>Comment</comment> <dhcp-client-identifier>dhcp-client-identifier</dhcp-client-identifier> <lease-settings> <lease-time>121</lease-time> <routers>10.0.0.3</routers> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>10.0.0.5</dns-servers> <broadcast-address>127.0.0.1</broadcast-address> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Sample_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> ip-address <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network-type>ipv4</network-type> <ip-address>10.0.0.1</ip-address> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2015-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>true</disable> <name>Name Of Fixed Address</name> <ip-address>10.0.0.2</ip-address> <comment>Comment</comment> <dhcp-client-identifier>dhcp-client-identifier</dhcp-client-identifier> <lease-settings> <lease-time>121</lease-time> <routers>10.0.0.3</routers> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>10.0.0.5</dns-servers> <broadcast-address>127.0.0.1</broadcast-address> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Sample_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> mac-address <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network-type>ipv4</network-type> <mac-address>00:00:00:11:11:11</mac-address> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2015-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>true</disable> <name>Name Of Fixed Address</name> <ip-address>10.0.0.2</ip-address> <comment>Comment</comment> <dhcp-client-identifier>dhcp-client-identifier</dhcp-client-identifier> <lease-settings> <lease-time>121</lease-time> <routers>10.0.0.3</routers> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>10.0.0.5</dns-servers> <broadcast-address>127.0.0.1</broadcast-address> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Sample_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> dhcp-client-identifier <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network-type>ipv4</network-type> <dhcp-client-identifier>Value of dhcp-client-identifier</dhcp-client-identifier> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2015-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>true</disable> <name>Name Of Fixed Address</name> <ip-address>10.0.0.2</ip-address> <comment>Comment</comment> <dhcp-client-identifier>dhcp-client-identifier</dhcp-client-identifier> <lease-settings> <lease-time>121</lease-time> <routers>10.0.0.3</routers> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>10.0.0.5</dns-servers> <broadcast-address>127.0.0.1</broadcast-address> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Sample_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> extensible-attributes <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network-type>ipv4</network-type> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Building</key> <value>sample</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2015-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>true</disable> <name>Name Of Fixed Address</name> <ip-address>10.0.0.2</ip-address> <comment>Comment</comment> <dhcp-client-identifier>dhcp-client-identifier</dhcp-client-identifier> <lease-settings> <lease-time>121</lease-time> <routers>10.0.0.3</routers> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>10.0.0.5</dns-servers> <broadcast-address>127.0.0.1</broadcast-address> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Sample_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
2> For IPV6
<items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network>10.0.0.0</network> <mask>24</mask> <network-view>default</network-view> <network-type>ipv6</network-type> <ip-address>2002::6</ip-address> <duid>55:55</duid> <comment>Value Of Comment</comment> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Building</key> <value>sample</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2015-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>false</disable> <duid>55:55</duid> <name></name> <ip-address>2002::16</ip-address> <ipv6-prefix>2012::</ipv6-prefix> <ipv6-prefix-bits>32</ipv6-prefix-bits> <comment>Comment</comment> <lease-settings> <valid-lifetime>123456</valid-lifetime> <preferred-lifetime>1234</preferred-lifetime> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>2002::11</dns-servers> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Demo_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
The Query Criteria that can be follow are as below, to update fixed address.
-> network,mask will get all the fixed address in the network. <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network>10.0.0.0</network> <mask>24</mask> <network-type>ipv6</network-type> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2015-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>false</disable> <duid>55:55</duid> <name></name> <ip-address>2002::16</ip-address> <ipv6-prefix>2012::</ipv6-prefix> <ipv6-prefix-bits>32</ipv6-prefix-bits> <comment>Comment</comment> <lease-settings> <valid-lifetime>123456</valid-lifetime> <preferred-lifetime>1234</preferred-lifetime> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>2002::11</dns-servers> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Demo_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> network,mask and network-view. <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network>10.0.0.0</network> <mask>24</mask> <network-view>default</network-view> <network-type>ipv6</network-type> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2015-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>false</disable> <duid>55:55</duid> <name></name> <ip-address>2002::16</ip-address> <ipv6-prefix>2012::</ipv6-prefix> <ipv6-prefix-bits>32</ipv6-prefix-bits> <comment>Comment</comment> <lease-settings> <valid-lifetime>123456</valid-lifetime> <preferred-lifetime>1234</preferred-lifetime> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>2002::11</dns-servers> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Demo_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> ip-address <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network-type>ipv6</network-type> <ip-address>2002::6</ip-address> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2015-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>false</disable> <duid>55:55</duid> <name></name> <ip-address>2002::16</ip-address> <ipv6-prefix>2012::</ipv6-prefix> <ipv6-prefix-bits>32</ipv6-prefix-bits> <comment>Comment</comment> <lease-settings> <valid-lifetime>123456</valid-lifetime> <preferred-lifetime>1234</preferred-lifetime> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>2002::11</dns-servers> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Demo_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> duid <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network-type>ipv6</network-type> <duid>55:55</duid> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2015-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>false</disable> <duid>55:55</duid> <name></name> <ip-address>2002::16</ip-address> <ipv6-prefix>2012::</ipv6-prefix> <ipv6-prefix-bits>32</ipv6-prefix-bits> <comment>Comment</comment> <lease-settings> <valid-lifetime>123456</valid-lifetime> <preferred-lifetime>1234</preferred-lifetime> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>2002::11</dns-servers> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Demo_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> comment <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network-type>ipv6</network-type> <comment>Value Of Comment</comment> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2015-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>false</disable> <duid>55:55</duid> <name></name> <ip-address>2002::16</ip-address> <ipv6-prefix>2012::</ipv6-prefix> <ipv6-prefix-bits>32</ipv6-prefix-bits> <comment>Comment</comment> <lease-settings> <valid-lifetime>123456</valid-lifetime> <preferred-lifetime>1234</preferred-lifetime> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>2002::11</dns-servers> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Demo_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> extensible-attributes <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network-type>ipv6</network-type> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Building</key> <value>sample</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2015-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>false</disable> <duid>55:55</duid> <name></name> <ip-address>2002::16</ip-address> <ipv6-prefix>2012::</ipv6-prefix> <ipv6-prefix-bits>32</ipv6-prefix-bits> <comment>Comment</comment> <lease-settings> <valid-lifetime>123456</valid-lifetime> <preferred-lifetime>1234</preferred-lifetime> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>2002::11</dns-servers> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Demo_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>

version The version of 'InfoBlox NIOS Appliance' which is supported by adapter.
Valid value: v6.3

output.description: Returned adapter response is captured in this context parameter.

documentation.description:
Update Items:
It is a generic wrapper to update different type of entries.
